document.full_text: a vietnamese legal scholar who sued the prime minister and called for an end to one-party rule went on trial on monday on charges of spreading propaganda against the state and faces up to 12 years in jail.
document.title: vietnam to try legal scholar who sued prime minister
lines_and_colors: a vietnamese legal scholar who sued the prime minister and called for an end to one-party rule went on trial on monday on charges of spreading propaganda against the state and faces up to 12 years in jail.
